DOC.brief_summary: The object study compare relative bioavailability lansoprazole 30 mg delayed-release capsule ( manufacture TEVA Pharmaceutical Industries , Ltd. distribute TEVA Pharmaceuticals USA ) PREVACIDÂ® capsule ( TAP Pharmaceuticals , Inc. ) healthy , adult , subject non-fasting condition .
DOC.brief_title: Lansoprazole 30 mg DR Capsule Replicate Food Study
DOC.detailed_description: Criteria Evaluation : FDA Bioequivalence Criteria Statistical Methods : FDA Bioequivalence Statistical Methods
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Body Mass Index 30 less Males nonpregnant female Normal clinical laboratory test result Subjects significant history chronic alcohol consumption ( past 2 year ) , drug addiction , serious gastrointestinal , renal , hepatic , cardiovascular disease , tuberculosis , epilepsy , asthma ( past 5 year ) , diabetes , psychosis glaucoma eligible study . Subjects whose clinical laboratory test value great 20 % outside normal range may retested . If clinical value outside range retesting , subject eligible participate study unless clinical investigator deem result significant . Subjects history allergic response class drug test exclude study . Subjects find urine concentration test drug allow participate . Subjects donate blood and/or plasma least 30 day prior first dose study . Subjects take investigational drug within 30 day prior first dose study allow participate . Female subject pregnant , breastfeeding , likely become pregnant study allow participate . Female subject child bear potential must either abstain sexual intercourse use reliable barrier method ( e.g . condom , IUD ) contraception course study ( first dose last blood collection ) allow participate . Female subject use hormonal oral contraceptive within 180 day dose allowed participate . Female subject positive inconclusive pregnancy test result withdrawn study . Subjects tolerate venipuncture allow participate .
